content: {"locationId": "11657", "organizationId": "9152", "name": "Sheldon Methodist Church", "address1": "45 Church Street", "address2": "", "city": "Sheldon", "state": "VT", "zipCode": "05483", "country": null, "phone": "802-933-4487", "phoneExt": "", "website": "", "latitude": "44.8824833", "longitude": "-72.9423718", "foodPrograms": "Food Distribution, Hot/Cold Meal Program", "serviceAreas": "", "languages": "", "features": "Parking Available", "aboutUs": "An interfaith food pantry which serves anyone from anywhere (no residency restriction).  We provide a large variety of fresh produce, refrigerated and frozen foods, and shelf stable dry goods.  We distribute USDA TEFAP food and CSFP commodity boxes.  We provide a limited supply of personal care items.  No appointment is necessary, just come during any open hours and you will be served.  The shelf operates similar to an ordinary grocery store with clients selecting items from display shelves.   We support emergency food access out of our normal hours by appointment.  Call 802-933-4487 or 802-734-8967.", "notes": "    We WILL be doing the Summer Meals for Kids program on the 4th of July    Pick-up will be from 3 to 4:15 PM at the food shelf. We'll be set up for drive thru so it should be easy and fast.    We will be open for our regular hours on Saturday        We support emergency food access out of our normal hours by appointment. Call 802-933-4487 or 802-734-8967. ", "contactName": "Grant John Gorton", "contactPhone": "802-933-4487", "contactEmail": "jgortonfarm@myfairpoint.net", "servicePrograms": "", "foodServiceTypes": "Accepts Walk-Ins, CSFP Program, Curbside Pickup / Drive Through, Grocery / Client Choice, Indoor Service, Lifting / Carrying Assistance, TEFAP Program", "dietRestrictions": "", "foodOfferings": "Dairy, Eggs, Fruits & Vegetables, Household Products, Meat, Pet Food / Supplies, Prepared Food / Grab and Go, Shelf Stable/Non-Perishable Goods, Toiletries / Hygiene Products", "networkAffiliations": [{"regionId": 73, "regionName": "Vermont Foodbank", "logoBlobNameSmall": "0372d5bd-e181-4692-bc7f-4880d66560ee.png", "website": "https://www.vtfoodbank.org/"}], "timeZoneName": "Eastern Standard Time", "timeZoneCode": "ET", "offsetHours": "-4", "schedules": ["Monday 4:00 PM-6:00 PM", "Monday 4:00 PM-6:00 PM", "Tuesday 10:00 AM-1:00 PM", "Tuesday 10:00 AM-1:00 PM", "Thursday 4:00 PM-7:00 PM", "Thursday 4:00 PM-7:00 PM", "Saturday 12:00 PM-3:00 PM", "Saturday 12:00 PM-3:00 PM"], "services": [], "specialHours": []}
